LO_UPDATE_USEDTIME
program_units.code:
PROCEDURE lo_update_usedtime IS
l_block_no number;
BEGIN
  select a.m_block_no
  into l_block_no
  from meetings a
  where a.m_isblock =0
  and a.meeting_no = :parameter.pr_meeting_no
  and exists(select 1 from meetings b 
                      where b.m_isblock = 8  
                       and b.m_block_no =0 
                       and b.meeting_no =a.meeting_no);
                       
                       
  if l_block_no is not null then 
                         
  update meetings
  set m_usedtime = (select sum(m_duration) from meetings where m_block_no = l_block_no)
  where meeting_no =l_block_no
  and m_isblock = 8  and m_block_no =0;
  
  end if;
                        
   
END;

GET_PATIENT_DATA
program_units.code:
PROCEDURE get_patient_data (IN_PATIENT      IN number,
                            OUT_ID_TYPE     IN OUT varchar2,
                            OUT_ID          IN OUT varchar2,
                            OUT_NAME        IN OUT varchar2,
                            OUT_FIRST_NAME  IN OUT varchar2,
                            OUT_FATHER_NAME IN OUT varchar2,
                            OUT_BDATE       IN OUT date,
                            OUT_SEX         IN OUT varchar2,
                            OUT_HTEL        IN OUT varchar2,
                            OUT_WTEL        IN OUT varchar,
                            OUT_CELL        IN OUT varchar2,
                            OUT_STATE       IN OUT varchar2,
                            OUT_CITY_NO     IN OUT number,                           
                            OUT_CITY_NAME   IN OUT varchar2,
                            OUT_STREET      IN OUT varchar2,
                            OUT_STREETNO    IN OUT varchar2,
                            OUT_ZIP         IN OUT varchar2,
                            OUT_P_CARD      IN OUT varchar2,
                            OUT_P_STATUS    IN OUT varchar2,
                            OUT_P_ACC       IN OUT varchar2,
                            OUT_P_REM       IN OUT varchar2,
                            OUT_DATE_INSERT IN OUT DATE,
                            OUT_P_REASON    IN OUT varchar2, 
                            OUT_P_SICK_FUND IN OUT varchar2,
                            OUT_P_FUND_CARD IN OUT varchar2,
                            OUT_INSUR_FLAG  IN OUT varchar2,
                            OUT_INSUR_CODE  IN OUT varchar2, 
                            OUT_OPER_CODE   IN OUT varchar2,
                            OUT_VAT         IN OUT varchar2,
                            OUT_INCL_NOW    IN OUT varchar2,
                            ERR_HANDLING    IN     varchar2) IS
  cursor C1 is
  select p_id_type,p_id,p_last_name,p_first_name,p_father_name,p_bdate,
         p_sex,p_htel,p_wtel,dbg_sms.clean_cellnumber(p_cell) p_cell,
         p_state,city_no,p_city_name,p_street,p_streetno,p_zip,p_credit_card,p_status,
         p_acc_code,p_remark,date_insert,p_reason,p_sick_fund,p_fund_card,
         p_insurance_flag,p_insurance_code,p_oper_code,p_vat,p_incl_now
  from PATIENT
  where patient_no = IN_PATIENT;

  ERR_HAND VARCHAR2(1);
  dummy_d    date;
BEGIN
	
	ERR_HAND  :=  lower(substr(ERR_HANDLING, 1, 1));

  open C1;
  Fetch C1 into OUT_ID_TYPE,OUT_ID,OUT_NAME,OUT_FIRST_NAME,OUT_FATHER_NAME,OUT_BDATE,
                OUT_SEX,
                OUT_HTEL,OUT_WTEL,OUT_CELL,OUT_STATE,OUT_CITY_NO,OUT_CITY_NAME,
                OUT_STREET,OUT_STREETNO,OUT_ZIP,OUT_P_CARD,OUT_P_STATUS,OUT_P_ACC,OUT_P_REM,
                OUT_DATE_INSERT,OUT_P_REASON,OUT_P_SICK_FUND,OUT_P_FUND_CARD,
                OUT_INSUR_FLAG,OUT_INSUR_CODE,OUT_OPER_CODE,OUT_VAT,OUT_INCL_NOW;
                 
  
  if C1%NOTFOUND then
  	if ERR_HAND != 'n' then
      errors(3716,ERR_HAND);
    end if;
  end if;
  close C1;
END;
